AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS Access Key ID required for authenticating API calls to AWS services.
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.title: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your AWS Secret Access Key required alongside the Access Key ID for authentication.
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.title: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region where your resources are located. Examples include 'us-east-1', 'eu-west-1'.
AWS_REGION.title: AWS_REGION

BEDROCK_LOG_GROUP_NAME.description: The name of the CloudWatch log group where Amazon Bedrock model invocation logs are stored.
BEDROCK_LOG_GROUP_NAME.title: BEDROCK_LOG_GROUP_NAME
